title: Deterministic State Evolution Commitment Summary Manifest (DCSM)
description: Finalized, cryptographically anchored, and immutable summary confirming a successful, deterministic state transition (Psi_N -> Psi_N+1) following P-01 PASS. Optimized for rapid verification and auditability.

AxiomaticVetoStatus.description: Validation checks confirming negation of all mandatory vetoes. 'true' indicates veto condition was successfully negated, certifying system state safety (i.e., NO vetoes triggered).

pvlm_status.description: Policy Veto Lockout Negation (¬PVLM). Must be true.

mpam_status.description: Minimum Performance Assurance Negation (¬MPAM). Must be true.

adtm_status.description: Anomaly Detection Threshold Negation (¬ADTM). Must be true.

AnchorLinkage.description: Crucial forensic and cryptographic identifiers linking the new state to the prior state.

previous_state_root_hash.description: Cryptographic hash (SHA3-256 equivalent) of the predecessor system state root (Psi_N).

state_root_hash.description: Cryptographic hash (SHA3-256 equivalent) of the resulting system state root (Psi_N+1).

tvcr_index.description: Index linking to the complete Trace and Veto Context Registry (TVCR) entry.

SignatureContext.description: Cryptographic signature verifying the manifest's integrity and source authority.

signing_algorithm.description: The cryptographic algorithm used for signing (e.g., Ed25519, ECDSA-P256).

commitment_signature.description: The digital signature (hex encoded) of the canonical manifest payload.

key_identifier.description: Identifier (e.g., public key hash or key ID) of the commitment authority.

signing_authority_id.description: The unique operational ID of the agent/component that generated and signed this commitment (e.g., SAG-CORE-DSE).

manifest_type.description: Definitive identifier for the type of manifest artifact.

protocol_version.description: SAG Specification version confirming compliance (e.g., V94.1)

dse_epoch_id.description: Unique, deterministic identifier for this Decentralized State Evolution (DSE) event.

commitment_timestamp.description: The exact time (ISO 8601 UTC) when the commitment finalization process completed.

status_p01.description: P-01 Finality Checkpoint result. MUST be true for commitment.

metrics_final.description: The quantified metrics used to satisfy P-01 verification (Utility Axioms).

temm.description: Target Evolution Momentum Metric (S01). Quantitative measure of progress alignment.

ufrm.description: Underlying Functional Resilience Metric (S02). Measure of systemic stability.

cftm.description: Commitment Finality Threshold Margin (Epsilon). Must be strictly greater than 0.

context_status.description: Environmental Context Verification Status (ECVM success). MUST be true.
